entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2 except 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway.

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
